dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3718854K] copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, April 01, 2007 11:29 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3718854K] copyright violation ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. copyright violation Added by system at Monday, Apr 2 2007 04:27 am X-MailFrom: dmjass@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Apr 2 04:27:43 2007 Received: (qmail 13920 invoked by alias); 2 Apr 2007 09:27:43 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 13917 invoked from network); 2 Apr 2007 09:27:43 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 2 Apr 2007 09:27:43 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 2 Apr 2007 04:27:43 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 02 Apr 2007 04:27:43 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from dmjass@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HYIpD-0006Gw-2L for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 02 Apr 2007 04:27:43 -0500 Received: from ug-out-1314.google.com ([66.249.92.170]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from dmjass@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HYIp9-000BiZ-M2 for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 02 Apr 2007 04:27:39 -0500 Received: by ug-out-1314.google.com with SMTP id m3so1644586ugc for ; Mon, 02 Apr 2007 02:27:37 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:disposition-notificat ion-to:date:from:reply-to:organization:user-agent:x-accept-language:mime -version:to:subject:content-type:sender; b=NpnDovfpDUhtmLLi/kBrKdGr1UtC9AH5Rz/pedQ4X3m0pynYAV1t+UNtYhpPDfgs0lPPXZ FWEdfZbgTVSE3i6ELmcQEnimE3UJBP2LoAzpTztfEHq8xv27H44oz0yfvbnqiYt3GTKh6imc SYIcI4IqP1poENu493nYtvsIWK9QQ= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:disposition-notification-to:date:from:reply-to:org anization:user-agent:x-accept-language:mime-version:to:subject:content-t ype:sender; b=YRa2EbwcH3DzZgCx3s/DCqwhvab+jo4JFp8nu8OhTST39CscqSP+j4h4VdQmUr+Xfg/H70 naxH6hW4cMsVVHrgMRU1CfXwk0cHQgBeotndlx93zLYCmNcPfL1uTsU4EoDNapiwFq5g8f6x sa1Ci4j2+xH/TNYabN7XJ/+73GJfI= Received: by 10.67.89.5 with SMTP id r5mr4347894ugl.1175506056524; Mon, 02 Apr 2007 02:27:36 -0700 (PDT) Received: from ?192.168.0.25? ( [217.77.223.19]) by mx.google.com with ESMTP id 50sm5186205ugb.2007.04.02.02.27.35; Mon, 02 Apr 2007 02:27:35 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <4610CC92.8000609@gotonikolaev.com> Disposition-Notification-To: "GOTONIKOLAEV.COM Team" Date: Mon, 02 Apr 2007 12:27:46 +0300 From: "GOTONIKOLAEV.COM Team" Reply-To: admin@gotonikolaev.com Organization: gotonikolaev.com User-Agent: Mozilla Thunderbird 1.0.6 (Windows/20050716) X-Accept-Language: ru-ru, ru MIME-Version: 1.0 To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: copyright violation Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="------------010208010607000201000804" Sender: Dmitry Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 66.249.92.170 as permitted sender) client-ip=66.249.92.170; envelope-from=dmjass@gmail.com; helo=ug-out-1314.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Apr 2007 09:27:43.0232 (UTC) FILETIME=[2A8BF800:01C77509] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello, My name is Dmitry Dubrovsky and I am the owner of domain name and web site gotonikolaev.com. We are renting aparttment out in the city of Nikolaev, Ukraine. Today I was browsing internet and found out the web site nikolaevapartmentsrent.com which is offering the same services as our company. I just checked their start page and did not believe my eyes - the copied the text from our start page and just posted at their web site. I am shocked because that is direct copyright violation. I have nothing personal against nikolaerapartmentsrent.com but I think that is not very good. Then I checked their IP address and found out that they are your customer. I contacted your Live Support and Kony S advised me to send my request to abuse@theplanet.com. If you need any additional info from my side then please let me know. I hope that my request will be satisfied. Thank you in advance, Dmitry. -- ------------------------------------------------------------------------ *GOTONIKOLAEV.COM * - Apartments, airfare, transfer and translation services in Nikolaev, Ukraine. *FLOWERS-NIKOLAEV.COM * - Flowers and Gifts delivery in Nikolaev, Ukraine. MIME element (text/html) Hello,

My name is Dmitry Dubrovsky and I am the owner of domain name and web site gotonikolaev.com. We are renting aparttment out in the city of Nikolaev, Ukraine.

Today I was browsing internet and found out the web site nikolaevapartmentsrent.com which is offering the same services as our company. I just checked their start page and did not believe my eyes - the copied the text from our start page and just posted at their web site. I am shocked because that is direct copyright violation. I have nothing personal against nikolaerapartmentsrent.com but I think that is not very good. Then I checked their IP address and found out that they are your customer. I contacted your Live Support and Kony S advised me to send my request to abuse@theplanet.com.

If you need any additional info from my side then please let me know. I hope that my request will be satisfied.
Thank you in advance,
Dmitry.
--


GOTONIKOLAEV.COM - Apartments, airfare, transfer and translation services in Nikolaev, Ukraine.

FLOWERS-NIKOLAEV.COM - Flowers and Gifts delivery in Nikolaev, Ukraine.

MIME element (text/plain)
